overview_of_class: The course examines the unique characteristics of exceptional children - physiological, intellectual, and social-emotional. The course also examines trends in legislation, educational programming and approaches to instruction for students with disabilities.
name: Educating Exceptional Children
title: SESP TEACH_ED 327-0-20 Educating Exceptional Children
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-Registration - Reserved for SESP Students.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course examines the unique characteristics of exceptional children - physiological, intellectual, and social-emotional. The course also examines trends in legislation, educational programming and approaches to instruction for students with disabilities.

subject: TEACH_ED
